Text: Bringing down the corporate tax rate to 15% for new manufacturing is a deep cut. In the medium term it will be one of the major consideration for companies to shift base from China to India, said DK Joshi, principal economist at Crisil.
Cause: In the medium term it will be one of the major consideration for companies to shift base from China to India, said DK Joshi, principal economist at Crisil.
Effect: Bringing down the corporate tax rate to 15% for new manufacturing is a deep cut.
Sentence: <e2>Bringing down the corporate tax rate to 15% for new manufacturing is a deep cut.</e2> <e1>In the medium term it will be one of the major consideration for companies to shift base from China to India, said DK Joshi, principal economist at Crisil.</e1>
